Here is some inline code `r 1 + 1`

```{r, starwars-plot, fig.cap="A ggplot of starwars stuff" }
library(tidyverse)
starwars %>% 
  filter(species == 'Human') %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x= height, y = mass) + geom_point()
```
we can see in  Figure \ref(@fig:startwars-plot)
```{r starwars-tbl}
library(tidyverse)
starwars %>% 
  filter(species == 'Human') %>%
  select(name, 
         height,
         mass,
         homeworld) %>%
  knitr::kable(caption = "Caption")

```
we can see in Table  \ref(@tab:startwars-tbl)
